Présent (Present).Je rentre: I bring in / I get in
Présent (Present).Tu rentres: You bring in / You get in
Présent (Present).Il/Elle rentre: He/She brings in / He/She gets in
Présent (Present).Nous rentrons: We bring in / We get in
Présent (Present).Vous rentrez: You bring in / You get in (formal)
Présent (Present).Ils/Elles rentrent: They bring in / They get in

Imparfait (Imperfect).Je rentrais: I used to bring in / I used to get in
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu rentrais: You used to bring in / You used to get in
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle rentrait: He/She used to bring in / He/She used to get in
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous rentrions: We used to bring in / We used to get in
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous rentriez: You used to bring in / You used to get in (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles rentraient: They used to bring in / They used to get in

Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai rentré: I brought in / I got in
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as rentré: You brought in / You got in
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a rentré: He/She brought in / He/She got in
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons rentré: We brought in / We got in
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez rentré: You brought in / You got in (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont rentré: They brought in / They got in

Futur simple (Simple Future).Je rentrerai: I will bring in / I will get in
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu rentreras: You will bring in / You will get in
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle rentrera: He/She will bring in / He/She will get in
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous rentrerons: We will bring in / We will get in
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous rentrerez: You will bring in / You will get in (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles rentreront: They will bring in / They will get in
